VEC.Q: How many ridgelines are in this ridgeline chart?
VEC.A: There are {7} slices in this chart.

SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Budget Shoppers relative to the peak of Tech-savvy Consumers in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Budget Shoppers is to the {left} of the peak of Tech-savvy Consumers.

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Tech-savvy Consumers} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =42.8?
EVJ.A: At X =42.8,the label with the highest density is {Organic Shoppers}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 41? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Organic Shoppers}'s peak at {80},{Ethical Consumers}'s peak at {78},{Convenience-Oriented}'s peak at {80}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 25? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Health-Conscious}'s peak at {7},{Premium Brands}'s peak at {14},{Budget Shoppers}'s peak at {11},{Tech-savvy Consumers}'s peak at {16}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Convenience-Oriented or Organic Shoppers?
NC.A: {Convenience-Oriented} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Convenience-Oriented or Ethical Consumers?
NC.A: {Convenience-Oriented} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {3} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Tech-savvy Consumers}
